update pr_inform_event
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_be_accused = #{personBeAccused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_address = #{businessAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registered_address = #{registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update pr_inform_event set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_be_accused = #{personBeAccused,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_address = #{businessAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_address = #{registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, informer_id = #{informerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, search_code = #{searchCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, evaluate = #{evaluate,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, supervisionDepartment = #{supervisiondepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT event .*, informer.name informerName, informer.gender, informer.phone, informer.postal_address postalAddress, informer.email, user.name operatorName FROM pr_inform_event event LEFT JOIN pr_informer informer ON event .informer_id = informer.id LEFT JOIN user_info user ON event.operator_id = user.id WHERE EVENT .id = #{id}

SELECT event.*,informer.name informerName,user.name operatorName FROM pr_inform_event event LEFT JOIN pr_informer informer ON event.informer_id=informer.id LEFT JOIN user_info user ON event.operator_id=user.id WHERE 1=1
AND event.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.person_be_accused LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.personBeAccused,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.business_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.businessAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.registered_address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.registeredAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.informer_id = #{prInformRep.informerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND informerName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.informerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.operator_id = #{prInformRep.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AND operatorName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.create_user LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.update_user LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND event.code = #{prInformRep.code,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AND event.search_code = #{prInformRep.searchCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AND event.state = #{prInformRep.state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
AND event.evaluate = #{prInformRep.evaluate,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
AND event.supervisionDepartment LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prInformRep.supervisiondepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY `event`.create_time DESC
